name: Hapless
flavor: The World just seems out to get you.
effect: Apply a -1 penalty to all tests you perform (note: rolls are not tests).
growthAbility: When you fail a test, lose -1 Fate.

name: Weak
effect: Start of Battle: Gain the Marked for Death Major Trauma card.
growthAbility: When you gain the Priority Target token, lose -1 Fate.

name: Coward
flavor: They lef tyou in the mountains, like they do with all the weaklings.
effect: When you are about to draw an Obool, add an Obol card from teh next threshold on the Massive Danger Chart to the Obol Deck for this draw only.
growthAbility: When you survive an Obol, lose -1 Fate.

name: Reluctant
flavor: You have no stomach for this.
effect: If you are in front of the Primordial, you have -1 Precision.
growthAbility: End of your turn: If you are in front and adjacent to the Primordial, lose -1 Fate.

name: Scapegoat
flavor: You'd have nothing to do with the barbarism.
effect: You cannot use Gear cards with the following traits: Axe, Blade, Javelin, Khopesh, Knife, Lance, Spear, Sword
growthAbility: When you deal a Wound, lose -1 Fate.

name: Restless
effect: You must always use your MovementAction to move at least one space.
growthAbility: End of your turn: If you didn't voluntarily move this turn, lose -1 Fate.

name: Ambrosia Addiction
growthAbility: When you discard at least 1 Ambrosia token, lose -1 Fate.

name: Bloodthirsty
flavor: You will kill every last one of them!
effect: You can use your CombatAction only to perform attacks.
growthAbility: End of your turn: If you didn't attack this turn, lose -1 Fate.

name: Clumsy
flavor: Things break so easily when you're around.
effect: You cannot unexhaust your Gear cards.
growthAbility: When you involuntarily exhaust a Gear card, lose -1 Fate.

name: Psychosomatic Disorder
flavor: You just can't pinpoint the pain - but it's there...
effect: When you draw a positive Truma card, ignore it and draw again (once per Trauma Draw).
growthAbility: When you draw a negative Trauma card, lose -1 Fate.

name: Apathy
growthAbility: If you rerolled 2 or more Attack Dice and none of them are hits, lost -1 Fate.

name: Fate-Hexed
growthAbility: When you gain a Crit Chance, lose -1 Fate.

name: Timid
effect: When you gain the Priority Target token, gain +1 Fate.
growthAbility: When you lsoe the Priority Target token, lose -1 Fate.

name: Enervated
flavor: You're so tired all the time...
effect: Start of Battle: Gain 1 CombatAction or MovementAction Fatigue token.
growthAbility: When you gain a CombatAction or MovementAction Fatigue token,, lose -1 Fate.

name: Superstitous
flavor: This will not be your day, the Oracles have spoken.
effect: You cannot ignore or re-draw Trauma cards.
growthAbility: If you re-draw a Trauma card or otherwise ignore its effect, lose -1 Fate.

name: Queasy
flavor: You have seen too much blood already...
effect: When you gain at least 1 Bleeding token, gain +1 Bleeding token.
growthAbility: When you gain at least 1 Bleeding token, lose -1 Fate.

name: Late
flavor: You arrived too late. Or too soon...
effect: During the Titan Round, you cannot voluntarily be the first or last to take your turn.
growthAbility: When you take your turn second or third during the Titan Round, lose -1 Fate.

name: Denigrated
flavor: You were worthless. At least that's what your father told you.
effect: After you place any tokens in the Kratos Pool, remove 1 token from the Kratos Pool.
growthAbility: When you place 5+ Kratos tokens in the Kratos Pool in a single ability window, lose -1 Fate.

name: Sowed
flavor: You feel something moving beyond the horizon. Something in you has irrevocably changed.
effect: Conqueror Nail and Repurposed Cryptex gain the Argonaut Possession keyword. During an Attack Roll, treat a '1' rolled on any of your dice as a Crit Miss (it may result in Crit Miss effects triggering multiple times). You cannot lose this Fate Mnemos, only resolve it.
growthAbility: Resolve the Reaped Special Event in the Cycle II Storybook.
